reviewText:
A.k.a Flight of the Living Dead: Outbreak on a Plane

...a fun addition to the zombie genre, no way in the top tier of the bunch but better than Romero's disappointing "Diary of the Dead" in my opinion... decent acting and story line and not too unnecessarily gory... good for a dark rainy night when a zombie flick is just what you need... stars a very enjoyable Kevin J. O'Connor (Beni from 1999 The Mummy) as a weaselly prisoner turned hero being flown to Paris to stand trial when a mishap unleashes a zombie in the plane's cargo hold...
